EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR NDAC RF Planner-Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for access to NDAC RF Planner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name} ,
Your request for access to the Nokia DAC RF Planner Tool has been granted. You can now access the tool via this link. A user guide to get you started can be downloaded here. Link to this tool is also visible on the homepage of the Nokia Partner Portal in the tools section. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our Nokia Partner support desk at: partner.support@nokia.com The Nokia Global Partner Team
